r.d: This is the MS SQL Server MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- fixed bug #11571: when using setLimit(), numRows() returns wrong values - fixed bug #12117: disconnect() does not work as documented - fixed bug #14019: MDB2 is not aware of MS-SQL 'smalldatetime' type
open todo items: - explore fast limit/offset emulation (Request #4544)
